definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cut, sharpen, decide (NH id., cut in, decide, Aram. in deriv.; As ḫarâṣu, dig, decide, ḫariṣu, trench, Zehnpfund:BAS i. 502; Ph. [[חרץ]] decision, Hoffm:AGG xxxvi, May 1889, 11)—
cut, mutilate Le 22:22 ([[עַוְּרֶת אוֹ שָׁבוּר]] [[אוֹ־חָרוּץ אוֹ יַבֶּלֶת]]).
sharpen, fig. the tongue, [[־כֶּלֶב לְשׁׂנוֹ לְ]]´[[לאׁ יֶח]] Ex 11:7 (J), i.e. utter no sound against Isr., Jos 10:21.
decide 1Ki 20:40 (abs.); so pt. pass [[חרוחים ימיו]] Job 14:5 his days are determined, fixed (‖[[מִסְפַּר חדשׁיו]]), Is 10:22 ´[[כִּלָּיוֹן ח]]; act with decision 2Sa 5:24.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[נֶחֱרָחָה]] Is 10:23 + 3 t.; [[נֶחֱרֶחֶת]] Da 9:26 (both these forms inf. cstr. acc. to Ba:NB 90); decisive ´[[כָּלָה וְנֶח]] Is 10:23, Is 28:22, Da 9:27 a consumption and strict decision (i.e. that which is strictly determined), [[נֶעֱשָָׂתָה]] ´[[כי נ]] Da 11:36; [[שׁׂמֵמוֹת]] ´[[נח]] Da 9:26 strict determining of desolation.
